summary.span: 表示 控件中的单个单元格。

span.span: Represents an individual cell in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示控件中的单个单元格 。The class represents an individual cell in a control. 您可以通过的集合检索单元格 。You can retrieve cells through the collection of a . 的行和列 标识单元格在中的位置 。The row and column for a identify the cell's location in the . 典型单元包含特定于包含它的行和列的数据。A typical cell contains data specific to the row and column in which it is contained. 通过设置单元属性并处理与之相关联的事件，可以通过多种方式对其进行自定义。The cell can be customized in a number of ways by setting its properties and handling the events associated with it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example illustrates the use of this type. 有关此示例的详细信息，请参阅 [如何：向 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的各个单元格添加工具提示](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/add-tooltips-to-individual-cells-in-a-wf-datagridview-control)。For more information about this example, see [How to: Add ToolTips to Individual Cells in a Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/add-tooltips-to-individual-cells-in-a-wf-datagridview-control). remarks.format: ## Remarks 单元格边框的默认宽度为一个像素。The default width of the cell border is one pixel. 使用以下 值来修改边框的宽度：Use the following values to modify the width of the border: - 该值表示宽度为0像素。The value denotes a width of 0 pixels. - 或 值将默认宽度增加1个像素。The or values increase the default width by 1 pixel. 此外，如果为 单元所属行设置了属性，则该矩形的高度将按的值增加 。In addition, if the property is set for the cell's owning row, the rectangle's height is increased by the value of . 如果为 单元的所属列设置了属性，则将按的值增加矩形的宽度 。If the property is set for the cell's owning column, the rectangle's width will be increased by the value of . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类的 方法 来确定单元中可用的绘图区域。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method of the class to determine the available drawing area in a cell. 此代码示例摘自 [如何：禁用 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的按钮列](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid)中的按钮中提供的一个更大的示例。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Disable Buttons in a Button Column in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid). summary.span: 获取或设置与单元格关联的快捷菜单。

span.span: Gets or sets the shortcut menu associated with the cell.

value.span: 与单元格关联的 。

span.span: The associated with the cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示通常在用户右键单击单元格时显示的快捷菜单。This property indicates the shortcut menu that is typically displayed when the user right-clicks the cell. 当 控件 属性已设置或其 属性为时 `true` ，获取属性的值将 引发控件的 事件，并返回 事件处理程序中指定的属性的值。When the control property is set or its property is `true`, getting the value of the property raises the event of the control and returns the value of the property as specified in the event handler. 如果没有针对事件的处理程序，则获取属性的值将 返回以前指定的值或其默认值 `null` 。If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the property returns the previously specified value or its default value of `null`. 在处理 大量数据时，处理事件主要是非常有用的，目的是为多个单元格设置单元值时避免性能下降 。Handling the event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the cell value for multiple cells. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). 更改此属性将引发 所属的事件 （如果存在）。Changing this property raises the event on the owning , if one exists. 您还可以通过设置行 属性或处理 控件的事件，为单独的行而不是单个单元指定快捷菜单 。You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row property or handling the control's event. 单元 属性设置将重写 row 属性设置，并且该 事件会重写 事件和行 属性设置。The cell property setting overrides the row property setting, and the event overrides both the event and the row property setting. 不过，您可以 `null` 为单元格快捷菜单指定以防止重写行快捷菜单。You can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu, however, to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为一种优化方法，通常，同一类型和相同的所有单元格都在一个 托管编辑控件中。As an optimization technique, typically all the cells of the same type and in the same share a single hosted editing control. 但是，在单元格使用控件之前，需要通过方法对其进行初始化 。However, before the control is used by a cell, it needs to be initialized by the method. 第一次调用时，此方法将控件添加到其父控件中的编辑控件列表 。The first time it is called, this method adds the control to the list of editing controls in its parent . 它还初始化单元的某些可视属性。It also initializes some of the visual properties of the cell. 例如， 设置编辑区域的背景色，使其与所提供的单元格样式参数匹配。For example, sets the background color of the editing area to match the supplied cell style parameter. 后续调用 不执行任何操作。Subsequent calls to do nothing. 派生类使用此方法来承载与 它们的类型相对应的类的实例。Derived classes use this method to host an instance of the class corresponding to their type. 例如，包含一个或多个对象的表 将调用此方法来向所属添加单个 编辑控件 。For example, a table that contains one or more objects calls this method to add a single editing control to the owning . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 从类派生的简单类中的方法 。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a simple class that derives from the class. 此示例摘自 [如何：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 单元格中承载控件](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells)中提供的一个更大的代码示例。This example is part of a larger code example provided in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在方法之前调用 。The method is called just before the method. 在派生类中，如果对的 `true` 调用具有取消 共享包含该单元格的行的效果，则该方法必须返回。In derived classes, it must return `true` if the call to has the effect of unsharing the row containing the cell. 否则，它应返回 `false` 。Otherwise, it should return `false`. 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅 [缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户编辑单元格值并提交更改时， 控件将调用此方法以将显示的值从转换 为 。When the user edits a cell value and commits the change, the control calls this method to convert the displayed value from the to the . 然后，该控件将基础单元值或数据源值设置为转换后的值。The control then sets the underlying cell value or data source value to the converted value. 此方法的默认实现 `formattedValue` 使用 参数指示的单元格样式的、和属性分析参数 `cellStyle` 。The default implementation of this method parses the `formattedValue` parameter using the , , and properties of the cell style indicated by the `cellStyle` parameter. 如果 `formattedValue` 等于，则 此方法将返回属性的值 ; `null` 如果 为 ，则该单元格 为引用类型。If `formattedValue` is equal to , this method returns the value of the property or `null` if is and the cell is a reference type. 如果不 `formattedValue` 等于，则 此方法 `formattedValue` 使用 属性和指定的或默认的转换器进行分析。If `formattedValue` is not equal to , this method parses `formattedValue` using the property and the specified or default converters. 如果该单元格 可为 null，则此方法将返回值包装为 类型。If the cell is nullable, this method wraps the return value as a type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否可以编辑单元格显示的数据。The property indicates whether the data displayed by the cell can be edited. 您可以 为个别单元格设置，也可以通过设置或属性，使整个单元或列的单元格成为只读的 。You can set for individual cells, or you can make an entire row or column of cells read-only by setting the or properties. 默认情况下，如果将某个单元格的父行或列设置为只读，则子单元将采用相同的值。By default, if a cell's parent row or column is set to read-only, the child cells will adopt the same value. 您可以通过 为个别单元格设置来重写此默认行为。You can override this default behavior by setting for individual cells. 您可以导航到只读单元格，并且可以将只读单元格设置为当前单元格。You can navigate to a read-only cell, and you can set a read-only cell to be the current cell. 仅影响单元格是否可编辑;它不会影响用户是否可以删除行。 only affects whether a cell is editable; it does not affect whether the user can delete rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用 cells 属性指示的样式显示单元格 ，该样式继承类型的其他属性的样式 。The control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell property, which inherits styles from other properties of type . 通过属性指定的样式将 覆盖通过所有其他单元格样式属性指定的样式，但不一定表示对该单元格的外观构成的所有样式。The styles specified through the property override the styles specified through all other cell-style properties, but do not necessarily indicate all the styles that contribute to the cell's appearance. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来获取单元的背景色。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to get the background color of a cell. 此示例是为类提供的更大代码示例的一部分 。This example is part of a larger code example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当鼠标指针位于单元格上且属性值不为时，此属性的值将显示为单元格工具提示 。The value of this property is displayed as the cell ToolTip when the mouse pointer is over the cell and the property value is not . 如果此属性的值为 ，则单元格将显示一个工具提示，其中包含单元格的值（如果单元格显示中的值被截断）; 否则，该单元格将不显示工具提示。If the value of this property is , the cell will display a ToolTip containing the value of the cell if the value is truncated in the cell display; otherwise, the cell will not display a ToolTip. 还可以通过将属性设置为来阻止显示工具提示 `false` 。You can also prevent the display of a ToolTip by setting the property to `false`. 当 控件 属性已设置或其 属性为时 `true` ，获取属性的值将 引发控件的 事件，并返回 事件处理程序中指定的属性的值。When the control property is set or its property is `true`, getting the value of the property raises the event of the control and returns the value of the property as specified in the event handler. 如果没有针对事件的处理程序，则获取属性的值将 返回以前指定的值或其默认值 。If there are no handlers for the event, getting the value of the property returns the previously specified value or its default value of . 在处理 大量数据时，处理事件主要是非常有用的，目的是为多个单元格设置单元值时避免性能下降 。Handling the event is primarily useful when working with large amounts of data to avoid performance penalties when setting the cell value for multiple cells. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control). 更改此属性将引发 所属的事件 （如果存在）。Changing this property raises the event on the owning , if one exists. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在事件的 事件处理程序中设置属性 。The following code example shows how to set the property within an event handler for the event. 此示例是在 [如何：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中向单个单元格添加工具提示](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/add-tooltips-to-individual-cells-in-a-wf-datagridview-control)中提供的一个更大的代码示例的一部分。This example is part of a larger code example provided in [How to: Add ToolTips to Individual Cells in a Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/add-tooltips-to-individual-cells-in-a-wf-datagridview-control).
